description: European exporters tell the BBC of their concerns about trade after the UK's exit.
title: Brexit: How EU businesses feel about trade deal
title_page: Brexit: How EU businesses feel about trade deal - BBC News
maintext: Of course we need to deal with it - we don't have a choice. But we hope and expect, based on the relationship we have built up with the UK, that the flower trade will continue, although of course it will be in a much more complicated way. We expect the UK will keep buying flowers and loving flowers, but there will be changes.
